of the chest PEC major pectoralis major
then there is pectoralis minor in order
to see that you have to remove
pectoralis major and that's exactly what

see that there's this muscle under it
that is pectoralis minor and then we
have another little muscle and this
muscle is called subclavius in this
muscle you can see it here it goes from
the first rib to the clavicle and we'll
